paragraphs.two: I'm a ordinary guy in loves with web development.  As self-taught as curious, i always try to be aware of things happening around the world, not just technology. As Bacon would say: "knowledge is power".
paragraphs.three: Philosophy, science, astronomy and spelling are other subjects that I like and that I declare myself a fan of (no more than that).
paragraphs.four: In short, i'm the type of person who likes to know the why of things just to stop feeding their ignorance.

cards.title: Competitivity
cards.text: I am one of those who do not like to be left behind, i always try to be at the forefront of new technologies. If it has to be done, it is done with the greatest possible effort.

cards.title: Constancy
cards.classes: wow magictime spaceInDown w-full md:mr-3 mt-3 md:mt-0
cards.text: I'm a 100% self-taught programmer, that says a lot about my discipline and perseverance. If I dedicate myself to learning or doing something, i don't leave it until i achieve it.

cards.title: Productivity and ideas
cards.classes: wow magictime spaceInRight w-full mt-3 md:mt-0
cards.text: Very good at adapting to the technologies and/or work methodologies that are imposed on me, but if things that are being done could work better, you will have my opinion.

skills.text: Highlight the use of UI frameworks such as: Vuetify, Quasar, Tailwindcss, Angular material, Materialize and Bootstrap. Git is understood, it is essential.
